text: It is reprehensible that every person is not even offered the opportunity to tale #Ivermectin #Chloroquine (no longer a #Hashtag, I see) #HCQ as a preventative, AND as a treatment for #Covid - I want to know, are doctors & pharmacists NOT allowed to prescribe & fill the orders?⚕️ https://t.co/GDLCrclNuN
